channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Is AI So Bad at Generating Images of Kamala Harris?
item.description: Race and gender are part of it, but there’s more to those unconvincing pictures of the presidential candidate.

item.title: Threads is not working on its own DM system yet, but it might make it easier to send Instagram messages
item.description: The Threads team is not yet working on a separate inbox or a direct messaging system for the social network, despite user demands and will continue to...

item.title: Inside Google’s 7-Year Mission to Give AI a Robot Body
item.description: As the head of Alphabet’s AI-powered robotics moonshot, I came to believe many things. For one, robots can’t come soon enough. For another, they shoul...

item.title: Google loses appeal against EU’s €2.4B Shopping antitrust decision, as bloc also wins Apple state aid appeal
item.description: Google has once again lost in its bid to overturn a 2017 antitrust decision by the European Commission. The bloc found its shopping comparison service...

item.title: Billionaire Finally Launches on First Private Space-Walk Mission
item.description: Hampered last month by bad weather, launch tower problems, and issues with its ride from SpaceX, the Polaris Dawn mission is at last on its way.

item.title: Formo gets investors’ mouths watering with Koji protein-based animal-free cheese
item.description: A love of food — and, well, cheese — has landed German fermentation startup Formo‘s co-founder Roman Plewka and its team a hefty $61 million Series B ...

item.title: Crispr-Enhanced Viruses Are Being Deployed Against UTIs
item.description: With antibiotics losing their effectiveness, one company is turning to gene editing and bacteriophages—viruses that infect bacteria—to combat infectio...

item.title: Swiggy weighs increasing its IPO size by $150M, aiming to raise up to $1.4B
item.description: Swiggy is considering boosting the fresh issue component of its IPO by $150 million, targeting a total of $1.4 billion. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights ...

item.title: James Earl Jones’ Darth Vader Has Already Been Immortalized With AI
item.description: James Earl Jones died Monday at the age of 93. But long before he did, he gave Lucasfilm permission to recreate his iconic Darth Vader voice for shows...

item.title: Sri Mandir helps Hindus visit sacred temples and offer donations virtually, from their phones
item.description: AppsForBharat, the startup behind Hindu devotional app Sri Mandir, has raised $18 million to penetrate into global markets and add new features. © 202...
